entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 9:18 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:18 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
